title: Learn About the Andromeda Galaxy
content: The Andromeda Galaxy is a barred spiral galaxy and is the nearest major galaxy to the Milky Way.

title: Learn about Different Galaxies
content: A galaxy is a huge collection of gas, dust, and billions of stars and their solar systems.

title: NASA Planning to Launch Space Shuttle Program Again
content: The Discovery space shuttle program might be implemented again in the coming years.

title: The Blue Planet - Earth
content: Earth is the third planet away from the sun and the only one in the 'Goldilocks zone' which is habitable for life.

title: Learn about the Solar System
content: Our Solar System is unique - it has a planet called Earth which contains water and is habitable for life.

title: Elon Musk Planning to Send Humans to Mars by 2030
content: Elon Musk's Starship mission is planning to take humans to the red planet by the end of 2030.
